content: designed in juicy shades of our 100% cotton lily sugar n cream this trendy hat will keep you cool while you re worshiping the sun worked from the top down this 2-tone bucket hat features a groovy pinwheel pattern that s created using an intarsia technique master crocheting in the round crochet intarsia increases and double_crochet techniques it s a great project to try out colorwork so keep the pattern handy video tutorial by marly bird https //www youtube com/watch v=xybzlo7dzu8 yarns for model lily® sugar n cream™ 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m contrast a hot pink 01740 1 ball contrast b tangerine 01699 1 ball
